sentence.Network_en: They refused to bend beneath the oppressor's yoke.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们拒绝屈服于压迫者的奴役.

sentence.Network_en: He will avenge the people on their oppressor.
sentence.Network_cn: 他将为(受压迫的)人民向压迫者报仇.

sentence.Network_en: Is it possible to be an oppressor and a victim at the same time?
sentence.Network_cn: 怎么可能既是压迫者同时又是受害者 呢 ?

PerfectNetExp.abs: 以o开头的英语英文单词 ... oppressive 残酷的、压迫的 oppressor 压迫者,压制者,暴君 opprobrious 辱骂的，恶名声的.
...al chivalry），经常帮助被压迫的（oppressed）无助者（the helpless），消灭压迫者（oppressor），或对过去的罪过（past wrong-doing）进行报复（retribution）。这和欧洲的骑.

list.abs: He was an oppressor ., 他是一位暴君.
they vowed vengeance against the oppressor .他们发誓向暴君复仇。

even as many americans make the mistake of viewing china as a monolithic superpower , the chinese , too , tend toward one-sided views of america . America the imperialist oppressor ; america the violent .正如现在许多美国人把中国错误地看成大一统的超级大国那样，中国人对美国的看法也趋向于片面美国是帝国主义压
at the most just among romantic story , in pay attention to oppressor class , just have such a thing .至多只是在浪漫故事中，或者在不受重视的被压迫阶级中，才有这样的事情。

entry.def: An oppressor is a person or group of people that is treating another person or group of people cruelly or unfairly.

example.ex: Lacking sovereignty, they could organise no defence against their oppressors.
example.tran: 没有主权他们就无法组织起来反抗压迫者。

means.word_mean: 1. a person of authority who subjects others to undue pressures

auth_sentence.content: We are challenging the oppressor, fighting through non-cooperation.
auth_sentence.res_content: We are challenging the oppressor, fighting through non-cooperation.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We are challenging the oppressor, fighting through non-cooperation.

auth_sentence.content: Neutrality helps the oppressor, never the victim.
auth_sentence.res_content: Neutrality helps the oppressor, never the victim.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Neutrality helps the oppressor, never the victim.

auth_sentence.content: When you rejoice in oppressing, you are an oppressor.
auth_sentence.res_content: When you rejoice in oppressing, you are an oppressor.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: When you rejoice in oppressing, you are an oppressor.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 表名词,主要表示"人或物器"

stems_affixes.value_cn: 前辈,前任,[被取代的]原有事物
stems_affixes.word_buile: pre前+de+cess走+or人→前面走过的人→前辈
act行动,行为,扮演+or人或物器→n.男演员,行动者,参与者
aggress侵略,进攻+or人或物器→n.侵略者,攻击者
arbitrate仲裁,公断+or人或物器→n.仲裁人,公断者
auth+or人或物器→n.作家,创造者
collect收集+or人或物器→n.收藏家,征收者
compress挤压+or人或物器→n.压缩机
conquer征服,战胜+or人或物器→n.征服者,胜利者
create创作+or人或物器→n.创造者,创作者
credit贷款+or人或物器→n.债权人
designate指定+or人或物器→n.指示者,指定者

stems_affixes.value_cn: 发现者,侦察器,探测器,检波器,检电器
stems_affixes.word_buile: detect察觉,发觉+or人或物器→n.发现者,侦察器,探测器,检波器,检电器
educate教育+or人或物器→educator教育家
execute执行+or人或物器→n.遗嘱执行人,执行者
gladiate剑状的+or人或物器→n.角斗士,与野兽搏斗者
indicate指示+or人或物器→n.指示器,[化]指示剂
ment精神+or人或物器→n.导师
moderate中等的+or人或物器→n.调解人,仲裁人
oppress压迫,压制+or人或物器→n.压迫者
past+or人或物器→原来是拉丁文"牧羊人"的意思
process过程,处理+or人或物器→n.处理机,处理器
proct监督+or人或物器→n.代理人,学监
project投射出+or人或物器→n.放映机

stems_affixes.value_cn: 海员,水手,不大会晕船的人,船员
stems_affixes.word_buile: sail航行+or人或物器→n.海员,水手,不大会晕船的人,船员

stems_affixes.value_cn: 继承者,接任者,后续的事物
stems_affixes.word_buile: success成功,胜利+or人或物器→继续着别人的成功→继承者,接任者
vend出售+or人或物器→n.小贩

sentences.en: They refused to bend beneath the oppressor’s yoke.
sentences.cn: 他们拒绝屈服于压迫者的奴役。

sentences.en: Extremists were exciting the people to rebellion against their oppressors.
sentences.cn: 极端主义者在鼓动人民起来反抗压迫者。
